name: Alone Together (Justin)
description:
Mouse for selecting upgrades

Player 1

  • WASD for movement, double tap to dash
  • L Shift for ranged attack
  • L Ctrl for melee attack

Player 2

  • Arrow keys for movement, double tap to dash
  • R Shift for ranged attack
  • R Ctrl for melee attack

Created by Miles Hatcliff, Steve Hughes, and Justin Wong
